name: Authentic Modern City Sanctuary  with parking
neighborhood_overview: My place located in a heart of East Boston, hot ant trendy historic district Eagle Hill. This part of East Boston was developed roughly between 1834 and 1900, and includes a remarkable concentration of original houses, old authentic restaurants, parks and unique streets.
description:
Wake up to this gorgeous centrally located condo. My place is brand new, spacious, uniquely decorated, with walking distance to authentic restaurants. Easy 24 hours self check-in, 5 min walk to metro station - makes my place the most convenient and cool place around. I hope to welcome you and provide you with a wonderful stay.

The space
Beautiful, filled with light, renovated, modern 2 bedroom/2 bath condo in trendy Eagle Hill. Condo features lovely high ceilings, marble bathrooms, professional chef eat-in kitchen, designer quartz counter-tops, high end LG appliances. central A/C, washer/dryer in the unit. Walk out to spacious deck.
My fully renovated comfortable space in premier location near Logan airport, downtown Boston, Boston medical Center, SoWa Open Market, Fenway Park, TD Garden, Brigham Women hospital

Other things to note
My own parking spot is 3 min walk from apartment

License number
STR-414601
